original_text: Then their boundary goes up westward and on to Mareal and touches Dabbesheth, then the brook that is east of Jokneam.
korean_text: 서쪽으로 올라가서 마랄라에 이르러 답베셋을 만나 욕느암 앞 시내를 만나고

sentences.original_text: Then their boundary goes up westward
and on to Mareal and touches Dabbesheth
then the brook that is east of Jokneam
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음에는 요그네암 동쪽의 시내에 이른다
